title: Did Ike say that if the political party does not support a moral issue, is it just a conspiracy to seize power?
subtitle: "I have a deep conviction that a political party can only call such a thing if its entire purpose is properly based on certain moral and spiritual values."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: President Eisenhower said that the political party must devote its efforts to advancing a moral cause, otherwise it was merely a conspiracy to seize power.
